item.title: 【General Music Discussion】How to enjoy dolby Atmos music?
item.description:
I see a lot of albums in dolby/Atmos and 5.1 - 7.1 audio. Is there a way to enjoy these on our portable devices or are these rips mainly for professional home theater systems?

I seen some headphones claiming they are dolby Atmos (like movies or gaming). I'm sure they would work well with music so as long as it's dolby 3D audio.

Has anyone tried these headphones or is it best to just use a home theater system to enjoy these tidal dolby/Atmos music?

Here is a link to some Atmos headphones:
https://www.dolby.com/experience/headphones/

Do you think those are good? And does Atmos need a subscription or is it a free codec/decoder? Like VLC, foobar or media player?
item.author: jrip1234
